name: Vegan Scallop XO Sauce Linguine
description: Linguine tossed in umami vegan XO sauce and topped with king oyster mushroom "scallops." A vegan Chinese-Italian fusion pasta dish.
recipeIngredient: 4 tablespoons vegetable oil (or other neutral oil)

recipeInstructions.name: Today we're working with the king oyster mushroom.

recipeInstructions.name: Trim off the ends and slice the mushrooms into around 1 cm thick cylinders.

recipeInstructions.name: With a knife, gently score one side of each cylinder. See the video above for how I score it!

recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, heat up the vegetable oil on high heat. Sear each "scallop" with the scored side down first. Flip when the scored side is crispy and golden.

recipeInstructions.name: Once you flipped all the "scallops," add the chili oil. Baste* the scallops with the chili oil. When both sides are golden-brown, they are ready. Take off the heat and set aside.

recipeInstructions.name: Prepare the pasta according to the directions on its packet. When the pasta is 2 minutes from being done, heat up the XO sauce in another pan.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the cooked pasta, a few tablespoons of pasta water, and toss to emulsify. Finally, add the scallops and top everything with thinly sliced scallions and nori.
